title: Crate Potion
summaries: Crate Potion is a buff potion which grants the Crate buff when consumed. The buff doubles the chance of getting a crate (from 10*1/10 (10%) to 20*1/5 (20%)) when fishing. This lasts for 3 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). The potion can be obtained both from crafting and as a quest reward from the Angler.
